subject: Re: Acoufelt UK - Product page refresh
preview: Hi Joel,  I hope you are well. Can I please request to be given access to the WordPress when possible. We are also looking to add a gated document to be posted on the website, ( potentially within the

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,

I hope you are well.
Can I please request to be given access to the WordPress when possible.
We are also looking to add a gated document to be posted on the website, ( potentially within the NEWS) section and I was wondering if you would be able to help us with that?
We have a graphic designer , to finalise the document but it would be good to know if there are specific requirements he may need to be aware of in advance.

Warm regards,

Bahar Sadr
Marketing Coordinator



T: +44 (0) 203 488 6322
Level 1 1 Old Street, London, EC1V 9HL, UK
acoufelt.com

Thank you! Clearing cache worked 😊

Warm regards,

Heather Jay
Executive Assistant - Global



T: +44 (0) 203 488 6322 • M: +44 (0)7919 248 643
Level 1, 1 Old Street, London, EC1V 9HL, UK
acoufelt.com

Hi Heather,

Thanks so much for checking in.

It might just be a cached version showing on your end — we’ve gone ahead and cleared both the site and server cache.

Would you mind giving it another try when you get a chance?

Appreciate your patience with this!

Thanks for looking into this Joel - Bahar and I have just tested and neither of these buttons work yet for either of us.

Warm regards,

Heather Jay

We’ve updated the Despatch Location in Salesforce to “London,” so you should be all set now. :)

Let me know if there’s anything else you need, always happy to help!

Hi Heather,

Hope you're doing well!

Thanks for flagging this. We're currently trying to track down where that location detail is being set. Would you mind sending through a screenshot or a link showing exactly where you're seeing? That’ll help us pinpoint whether this is coming from the website setup, Salesforce, or another system.

Appreciate your help!

Hi Heather,

Thanks,
Andy

Hi Heather,
I hope you're doing well.
Apologies for the delay in getting back to you.
Just confirming that the pages have now been updated to reflect the latest live changes.

- Redirects are in place.
- Mobile menus have been completed - please review and confirm if the order is correct
- Desktop menus have also been updated - kindly check the order there as well.

Please let us know if you notice any issues.
Also, could you kindly send through the BIM files for the Ovale 3D Acoustic Tiles when you have a chance?

Thanks
